    • Method Detail

      • isNormalWindow

        public boolean isNormalWindow()
        Check whether current window mode is normal window
        Returns:
        true if normal window mode
        false otherwise

      • isMultiWindow

        public boolean isMultiWindow()
        Check whether window mode is multi window
        Returns:
        true if multi window mode
        false otherwise

      • normalWindow

        public void normalWindow()
        Changed window state to normal.

      • getRectInfo

        public Rect getRectInfo()
        Get size and location of MultiWindow
        Returns:
        size and location of MultiWindow if its window mode is multiwindow return current window size, unless return a maximum window size.

      • getZoneInfo

        public int getZoneInfo()
        Get the window zone Information
        Returns:
        current zone that activity is obscured.

      • setStateChangeListener

        public boolean setStateChangeListener(SMultiWindowActivity.StateChangeListener listener)
        set listener for detecting changing window mode and info. this api is operated from api level 18 (Android 4.3).
        Parameters:
        listener - MultiWindowListener listener has three override API 'onModeChanged' and 'onZoneChanged' and 'onSizeChanged' to address event when window mode or zone or size is changed.
        Returns:
        returnValue, true when successfully registered

      • makeMultiWindowIntent

        public static Intent makeMultiWindowIntent(Intent intent,
                           int zoneInfo)
        Make an intent for starting Activity in MultiWindow
        Parameters:
        intent - for launching application in multi window mode.
        zoneInfo - for window location in split mode.
        Returns:
        intent
